code:
stateDiagram-v2
    %% ───────── Top-level flow ─────────
    [FinTech_FraudDetection] --> WaitForEntryRequest

    WaitForEntryRequest --> ProcSecCard : reqReadSecurityCard
    ProcSecCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : flagSecurityCardFailure
    ProcSecCard --> ProcBioData        : CardStatus==Valid
    ProcBioData  --> UnlockLockAP      : Authenticated
    UnlockLockAP --> WaitForEntryRequest : evAccessPointLocked

    %% ───────── Composite ① ─────────
    state "ProcessingSecurityCardData" as ProcSecCard {FinTech_TransactionQueue] --> ValidatingCard
        ValidatingCard --> WaitForEntryRequest : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount<3
        ValidatingCard --> Fail3Card           : SecCardFailure / ScFailCount>=3
        ValidatingCard --> exit                : CardStatus==Valid

        state Fail3Card {FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> DisableAccount
            DisableAccount --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [FinTech_LedgerService]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ② ─────────
    state "ProcessingBiometricData" as ProcBioData {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> AuthenticatingBio
        AuthenticatingBio --> WaitForEntryRequest : BsTimeout
        AuthenticatingBio --> Fail3Bio           : BioScanFailure / BFailCount>=3
        AuthenticatingBio --> exit               : Authenticated

        state Fail3Bio {FinTech_PaymentGateway] --> DisableAccountB
            DisableAccountB --> exit : done
        }
        exit --> [FinTech_PaymentGateway]
    }

    %% ───────── Composite ③ ─────────
    state "UnlockingAndLockingAccessPoint" as UnlockLockAP {FinTech_FraudDetection] --> Locked
        Locked --> Unlocking : reqUnlockAccessPoint
        Unlocking --> Unlocked : evAccessPointUnlocked
        Unlocked --> Locked : reqLockAccessPoint
    }
compilation_error: [WinError 2] 系统找不到指定的文件。

cscw_dialogue.utterance: 这里必须包含 FinTech_TransactionQueue 和 FinTech_PaymentGateway 这一块。
抱歉，稍微改一下，把刚才那个改成 FinTech_TransactionQueue处理。
明白，所以它是承接上一步的，内容是 'FinTech_TransactionQueue处理'？
[系统日志: Editor 更新了图表代码以反映上述结构]
